name: Doodle Live: Host Live Meetings
intro: Collaborate with unlimited users to share your ideas and take your teamwork to the Next Level. Work together anywhere, anytime!
features: Host Meetings with unlimited users.
Sketch & Share.
Live Chat Integration.
Share notes with our rich text editor.
Live code with Automatic Syntax Highlighting.

name: Buddies: Your Personal Assistant
intro: A WhatsApp chatbot designed for the users with 20+ features by integrating several APIs, Libraries, and Datasets.
features: Get latest news every morning directly in your inbox.
Users can set reminders and tasks so that they get reminded at their set Date and time.
Subscribe to services like Jokes, facts, pickup lines, quotes and many more to receive these daily.
Users can get lyrics for songs and definition of a word directly via Buddies.
We often forget to drink water at times when we are busy, Buddies will remind users to drink water every 2 hours if they subscribe for water notifications.
And just to add a cherry on the cake we have points and levels in Buddies where our users can compete with their friends against their points and levels.

name: Lyrics Extractor: Python Library
intro: Get Lyrics for any songs by just passing in the song name (spelled or misspelled) in less than 2 seconds using this awesome Python Library.
features: Artist name is not required while passing in the song name.
If there are more then one song fetched with the same title than the most popular song is chosen among all.
It fetches, extracts and returns the song's title and song lyrics from various websites autocorrecting the song names for the misspelled names along the way.
